neighbors.name: Parkside At Buckeye HOA
neighbors.claims: Parkside at Buckeye HOA is the homeowners association of a residential community in Buckeye, Arizona, and is listed as a formally notified party in local planning and zoning matters ([City of Buckeye](https://d3n9y02raazwpg.cloudfront.net/buckeyeaz/b652ef45-11a4-11ec-9f1e-0050569183fa-d5033dd7-ac20-4286-a50e-adc27e05b567-1634864338.pdf)). The association manages common areas and architectural standards for the subdivision ([Parkside at Buckeye HOA](https://www.parksideatbuckeye.org/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Standard HOA function; listed on city notification rolls but no evidence of political lobbying.

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact the HOA board or management company formally; acknowledge their role in maintaining community standards and offer a presentation on project aesthetics and property value protections.

citations.claim: Listed as a formally notified party in local planning and zoning matters
citations.title: City of Buckeye Planning and Zoning Commission Agenda

citations.claim: The association manages common areas and architectural standards
citations.title: Parkside at Buckeye HOA Official Website

neighbors.name: Enrique Rodriguez
neighbors.claims: Enrique Rodriguez is the recorded owner of a land parcel in the Buckeye area of Maricopa County, Arizona ([Maricopa Assessor](https://www.mcassessor.maricopa.gov/)). A review of City of Buckeye public records and meeting minutes yields no evidence of public office, civic appointments, or statements regarding development projects ([City of Buckeye](https://www.buckeyeaz.gov/government/city-clerk/meeting-agendas-minutes/meetings-agendas-minutes)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowner; no public role identified in city records.

approach_recommendations.engage: Use a personal, respectful outreach (e.g., a face-to-face meeting) to explain the project and invite Rodriguez to share any concerns or questions.

citations.claim: Recorded owner of a land parcel in the Buckeye area
citations.title: Maricopa County Assessor Parcel Search

citations.claim: No evidence of public office or statements regarding development projects
citations.title: City of Buckeye Meeting Agendas & Minutes Archive

neighbors.name: Morakod Aphaisuwan & Pimpaporn Tientanawat
neighbors.claims: Morakod Aphaisuwan and Pimpaporn Tientanawat are associated with a residential address in Buckeye, Arizona, through business entity filings ([AZ Corp Commission](https://ecorp.azcc.gov/CommonHelper/GetFilingDocuments?barcode=23091616510539)). They have no known public profile in local civic affairs, and no record was found of either individual taking a public stance on energy projects ([City of Buckeye](https://www.buckeyeaz.gov/government/city-clerk/meeting-agendas-minutes/meetings-agendas-minutes)).
